name: Graz's Mini Maze
description:
WASD Movement. Collect the key and go to the door.

So the main character: graz, is going through a tough time in life, his parents died in a freak accident he's suffering from extreme depression and 
he gets so deep he starts seeing these things I called Depression Demons and they start chasing him out of his house and graz has been in his room 
being depressed for so long that he's unfamiliar with his own house structure so i's like a maze and that's when the playable part comes in and you 
control graz and escape through an amount of rooms and then after a while you can escape from the house and be free from the Depression Demons.
